nodes.text: Star Wars Weekly 96: Han Solo's Fatal Gamble Against the Empire! is the ninety-sixth issue in the Marvel UK Star Wars series of comics.

This issue includes Switch!, the third black & white part of the story Way of the Wookiee!, which was reprinted in color in Marvel Illustrated Books' Star Wars. Won't be until the arrival of the Star Wars Omnibus series from Dark Horse Comics that the comic shows its original non-color style.
